text: Hi everyone. Can I use visibility in my fields.json to hide the date part of a datetime module?
If I use a module multiple times on a page, does it's css and js file get loaded multiple times as well or just once?

<@U02BRFR003Z> this is why we can’t use HubL in the CSS/JS windows; so they’re always the exact file and therefore can be loaded only once. Same goes for any assets attached in the `meta.json` file :slightly_smiling_face:

I have the same question. Looks like there are 2 size_types: `auto` and `auto_custom_max` . I think `auto` is the default whether you set a default image or not. But I can't figure out when `auto_custom_max` is used.
